DOC.brief_summary: Nerves rate limit factor control muscle function . However , unknown nutritional supplement change nerve-muscle interaction , therefore alter human performance . This study first examine effect omega-3 supplementation neuromuscular function train individual .
DOC.detailed_description: Participants come lab 3 session , one familiarization two testing . Familiarization - At time , anthropometric measurement include height , weight , BMI ( body mass index ) body composition determine . Participants familiarize interpolated twitch technique perform maximal voluntary contraction quadriceps muscle . Next , Participant 's 10 repetition maximum squat weight establish start participant select weight gradually increase 10 squat repetition complete . A VO2max ( maximum oxygen consumption ) test perform cycle ergometer use standard method . On test session 1 2 follow neuromuscular performance measure evaluate : 1 . Quadriceps muscle voluntary activation assess use interpolated twitch technique doublet twitch technique . Participants seat instructed perform three 5 second maximal voluntary isometric contraction least 1 minute apart - participant 's ankle restrain padded cuff attach load cell . For second maximal isometric contraction 3 second contraction , square wave superimpose stimulus deliver 1 millisecond femoral nerve monopolar touch-proof cathode electrode secure femoral triangle . 2 , 7 12 second contraction rest twitch deliver comparison muscle force . For third maximal isometric contraction , 3 second contraction , two 1 millisecond square wave superimpose stimuli 100 Hz deliver 10 millisecond apart . 2 second contraction stimulus apply . At 7 second , two stimulus deliver 100 millisecond 10 Hz apart 12 second single stimulus deliver . The percutaneous electrical stimulation deliver Biopac stimulator ( BSLSTMA , Biopac Systems , Santa Barbara , California ) maximum voltage 400 V. During familiarization , participant receive several submaximal stimulation acclimatization current intensity gradually increase peak twitch torque muscle action potential amplitude reach . A stimulus 1.2 time current required elicit peak twitch torque action potential amplitude use ensure maximal activation . The interpolated twitch technique use examine difference muscle activation maximal contraction superimpose stimulation . Voluntary activation calculate use formula : Voluntary activation ( % ) = ( 1- superimpose twitch / twitch evoke rest ) x 100 Surface self-adhesive silver chloride electrode place belly vastus lateralis , vastus medialis biceps femoris muscle measure muscle electrical activity ( electromyography ) maximal voluntary contraction previously describe . 2 . Vertical jump - Quadriceps power assess use vertical jump test force plate ( AMTI , Watertown , Massachusetts , USA ) . Participants complete two attempt jump high possible crouch two attempt use counter jump technique ( participant start stand , bend knee jump ) . 3 . Push-up - Upper body strength endurance examine participant complete many push-ups possible one-minute . Participants give one-minute rest ask complete many push-ups possible minute . A piece soft foam attach floor provide participant feedback low must go perform push-up . 4 . 10RM ( 10 repetition maximum ) squat - After complete optional 2 4 repetition 75 % 10RM weight determine baseline data collection , participant complete many repetition possible . 5 . Wingate test - Participants fitted cycle ergometer ( Excalibur Sport V2.0 , Lode , Groningen , The Netherlands ) . They cycle fix resistance 0.075kg / kg body mass 30 second use maximum effort . Verbal encouragement provide participant help produce maximum effort . 6 . Cycling time trial - Participants complete 10km time trial cycle ergometer ( Excalibur Sport V2.0 , Lode , Groningen , The Netherlands ) . Participants ' inspire expired gas measure use metabolic cart ( Cortex , Leipzig , Germany ) . Gas variables cycle power output measure use supply software . This change protocol alter risk participant level condition quite high similar level exertion would require daily training . Supplementation - In session 1 2 , 21 day break participant computer randomize either omega-3 supplementation olive oil placebo . Participants take 2.5 mL serve seal oil ( 2500 mg n-3 , 255 mg DHA ( docosahexaenoic acid ) 187.5 mg EPA ( eicosapentaenoic acid ) 500 IU vitamin D3 1000 IU vitamin A ) ( Auum Inc. , Timmons , On ) 2.5 mL olive oil ( Bertolli , Mississauga , Ont ) 500 IU vitamin D 1000 IU vitamin A added twice daily breakfast dinner . All supplementation amount within amount specify Health Canada Guidelines . Session 2 - After 21 day supplementation period , participant return lab second evaluatory session use identical protocol session 1 .
DOC.criteria: At least 2 year train experience include resistance training , specifically back squat Successfully complete ParQ questionnaire Individuals currently take omega3 and/or omega6 supplement within 4 week study Individuals take mammalian base omega3 6 supplement past 6 month Individuals consume fish twice per week within 4 week study
